What is one advantage of a magnetic stor: What is one advantage of a solid-state storage media?
Large storage capacity of up to terabyte: Much faster than magnetic or optical storage media
Durable and resistant to physical damage: Relatively cheaper compared to magnetic or optical storage media
Small form factor: Readily accessible compared to magnetic or optical storage media

What is one advantage of a magnetic stor: What is one difference between RAM and ROM?
Large storage capacity of up to terabyte: The data stored on RAM are lost when the power is interrupted but not for ROM
Durable and resistant to physical damage: RAM stores data while ROM store instructions
Not susceptible to data corruption over: RAM is used primarily for reading data while ROM is primarily used for writing data
Small form factor: RAM has a fixed storage capacity while the storage of a ROM can be expanded

Which definition most aptly describes what a Local Area Network is?
Large storage capacity of up to terabyte: Network of computing devices connected within a small geographical area, typically within the same building, such as a home, school or office
Durable and resistant to physical damage: Network of computing devices typically spanning across two or more buildings within the same town or city
Not susceptible to data corruption over: Network of computing devices covering a large-scale geographical area, typically across multiple geographical locations
Small form factor: Network of computing devices connected locally within an area

What is one advantage of a magnetic stor: What is one advantage of a Client-Server Network?
Large storage capacity of up to terabyte: Centralised control of data and resources
Durable and resistant to physical damage: Cheaper to set up the server
Not susceptible to data corruption over: Easy to set up the server
Small form factor: No administrative costs needed to maintain the server and client

What is one advantage of a magnetic stor: What is one advantage of a Peer-To-Peer Network?
Large storage capacity of up to terabyte: Cheaper to set up as there is no cost related to dedicated servers
Durable and resistant to physical damage: Centralised control of data and resources
Not susceptible to data corruption over: Security is not an issue due to the lack of a central server
Small form factor: Less effort to access and back up resources
